attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson as he has lost the public mandate through his own actions
attributes.additional_details: We would like to prove to the prime minister that the general public no longer have trust in his premiership to lead the country and to carry on pushing forward with the mandate he is claiming he has been entrusted to deliver since the election in 2019
attributes.background: We would like Parliament to take into their own hands, the removal of the Prime Minister. We would call for a vote of no confidence from the entire entire house. His position is completely untenable. He has lost the faith of his cabinet, his back bench and the undersigned people of this country

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes calling for a Minister to be removed from their job, or for a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

Change the law so that UK citizens can call a General election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618068
